description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台前编辑，中共中央政治局前常委周永康的第二任妻子。2016年因犯受贿罪、利用影响力受贿罪被判处九年有期徒刑。
description.en: A former editor at China Central Television and the second wife of Zhou Yongkang, a former member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party. In 2016, she was sentenced to nine years in prison for bribery and accepting bribes by using influence.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山西省大同市的县，是贾晓晔的出生地。
description.en: A county in Datong, Shanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Jia Xiaoye.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山西省的城市。
description.en: A city in Shanxi Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔的母校，前身为中南矿冶学院。2000年4月与长沙铁道学院、湖南医科大学合并组建为中南大学。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye's alma mater, formerly known as the Central South Institute of Mining and Metallurgy. In April 2000, it merged with Changsha Railway University and Hunan Medical University to form Central South University.

nodes.id: 中国中央电视台财经频道

zh-cn: 中国中央电视台财经频道

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台旗下的财经专业频道，贾晓晔曾在此担任编辑和栏目编导。
description.en: The finance and business channel of China Central Television, where Jia Xiaoye once worked as an editor and program director.

en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导和管理政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads and manages political and legal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省宜昌市的中级人民法院，该法院一审判处贾晓晔九年有期徒刑。
description.en: The intermediate people's court in Yichang, Hubei Province, China, which sentenced Jia Xiaoye to nine years in prison in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省的城市。
description.en: A city in Hubei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔的父亲，曾于大同市区的雁北艺校工作。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye's father, who once worked at the Yanbei Art School in Datong.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔的姐姐，曾任中石油加拿大公司副总。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye's older sister, who served as the deputy general manager of PetroChina Canada.

description.zh-cn: 由中南工业大学、长沙铁道学院、湖南医科大学于2000年合并组建的大学。
description.en: A university formed in 2000 from the merger of Central South University of Technology, Changsha Railway University, and Hunan Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 2000年与中南工业大学、湖南医科大学合并组建为中南大学。
description.en: In 2000, it merged with Central South University of Technology and Hunan Medical University to form Central South University.

description.zh-cn: 2000年与中南工业大学、长沙铁道学院合并组建为中南大学。
description.en: In 2000, it merged with Central South University of Technology and Changsha Railway University to form Central South University.

description.zh-cn: 周永康的原配妻子。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在四川省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家电视台。
description.en: The state broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国石油天然气勘探开发公司原总经理，曾提拔贾晓霞。
description.en: Former general manager of PetroChina Exploration and Production Company, who promoted Jia Xiaoxia.

nodes.id: 中国石油天然气集团公司加拿大公司

zh-cn: 中国石油天然气集团公司加拿大公司

description.zh-cn: 中国石油天然气集团公司在加拿大的分公司。
description.en: The Canadian subsidiary of China National Petroleum Corporation (PetroChina).

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家。
description.en: A country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔是周永康的第二任妻子，在周永康原配王淑华去世后与他结婚。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye is the second wife of Zhou Yongkang; they married after the death of Zhou's first wife, Wang Shuhua.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔出生于山西省大同市灵丘县。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye was born in Lingqiu County, Datong, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 1986年至1990年就读于中南工业大学，攻读管理工程专业财务管理方向。
description.en: From 1986 to 1990, she studied at Central South University of Technology, majoring in financial management in the management engineering program.

relationships.target: 中国中央电视台财经频道

description.zh-cn: 约1995年进入央视经济频道（财经频道前身）工作，担任编辑和栏目编导。
description.en: Around 1995, she joined the CCTV Economics Channel (predecessor of the Finance Channel) and worked as an editor and program director.

description.zh-cn: 因犯受贿罪、利用影响力受贿罪，被湖北宜昌市中院一审判处九年有期徒刑。
description.en: She was sentenced to nine years in prison in the first instance by the Yichang Intermediate People's Court in Hubei for bribery and accepting bribes by using influence.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔是贾丙文的女儿。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye is the daughter of Jia Bingwen.

description.zh-cn: 贾晓晔是贾晓霞的妹妹。
description.en: Jia Xiaoye is the younger sister of Jia Xiaoxia.

description.zh-cn: 王淑华是周永康的原配（第一任）妻子。
description.en: Wang Shuhua was Zhou Yongkang's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 周永康曾任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang once served as the Secretary of the CPC Sichuan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周永康曾任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang was a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周永康曾任中央政法委书记。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang once served as the Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 薄启亮将贾晓霞提拔为中石油加拿大公司副总。
description.en: Bo Qiliang promoted Jia Xiaoxia to the position of deputy general manager of PetroChina Canada.

relationships.target: 中国石油天然气集团公司加拿大公司

description.zh-cn: 贾晓霞曾任中石油加拿大公司副总。
description.en: Jia Xiaoxia served as the deputy general manager of PetroChina Canada.

description.zh-cn: 中南工业大学与长沙铁道学院、湖南医科大学合并组建为中南大学。
description.en: Central South University of Technology merged with Changsha Railway University and Hunan Medical University to form Central South University.

description.zh-cn: 长沙铁道学院与中南工业大学、湖南医科大学合并组建为中南大学。
description.en: Changsha Railway University merged with Central South University of Technology and Hunan Medical University to form Central South University.

description.zh-cn: 湖南医科大学与中南工业大学、长沙铁道学院合并组建为中南大学。
description.en: Hunan Medical University merged with Central South University of Technology and Changsha Railway University to form Central South University.

relationships.source: 中国中央电视台财经频道

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台财经频道是中国中央电视台下属的专业频道。
description.en: The CCTV Finance Channel is a specialized channel under China Central Television.
